title: Bug 37941Coolbar setMinimumSize introduces chevrons on Linux
description: Bug 37941Coolbar setMinimumSize introduces chevrons on Linux
OB: Build 20030516Run the attached test case.Press the Set Size button.Notice that the size of the coolitems is changed and chevrons are introduced.Doing the same on Windows properly maintains the coolbar layout.
SR: Build 20030516Run the attached test case.Press the Set Size button.Notice that the size of the coolitems is changed and chevrons are introduced.Doing the same on Windows properly maintains the coolbar layout.
